GSD.product_version: versions from v5.11 to before v5.15.79
GSD.description:
dmaengine: ti: k3-udma-glue: fix memory leak when register device fail

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.79 by commit 1dd27541aa2b95bde71bddd43d73f9c16d73272c, it was introduced in version v5.11 by commit 5b65781d06ea90ef2f8e51a13352c43c3daa8cdc. For more details please see the references link.
